name: HybridConnectionManager Service Installation
description: Rule to detect the Hybrid Connection Manager service installation.
false_positives: Legitimate use of Hybrid Connection Manager via Azure function apps.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND event.code:4697 AND service.name:HybridConnectionManager AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*HybridConnectionManager*)`
